missionStampDetails.description: Play Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Connect and get LINE stickers! Clear all missions to get special LINE stickers!

<color=#f84828>*You must be logged in to LINE to receive your stickers.
*Stickers will be available for 90 days after downloading.
*Please remember to download your stickers before the campaign period ends. Stickers will not be available for download outside the campaign period.</color>
Play Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Connect and get LINE stickers! Clear all missions to get special LINE stickers!

<color=#f84828>*You must be logged in to LINE to receive your stickers.
*Stickers will be available for 90 days after downloading.
*Please remember to download your stickers before the campaign period ends. Stickers will not be available for download outside the campaign period.</color>
